question: In which one of the following nations "Neft Daslari", an oil-industrial town on the sea, is located?
explanation: Neft Daslari, otherwise known as Oil Rocks, is an industrial settlement in the Caspian Sea, Baku, Azerbaijan. It is a full town on the sea. It holds a Guinness Record as the world's first offshore oil platform. It is almost a functional city.
